etomica.space

Class BoundaryRectangularNonperiodic

  • java.lang.Object
    • etomica.space.Boundary
      • etomica.space.BoundaryRectangular
        • etomica.space.BoundaryRectangularNonperiodic
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IBoundary, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BoundaryPistonCylinder

    public class BoundaryRectangularNonperiodic
extends BoundaryRectangular
    Boundary that is not periodic in any direction. Volume is specified, but nothing about boundary enforces the dimensions on the atoms. This effect must be introduced with a potential or other construct that is made consistent with the boundary.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
